reviewText: DVD quality is very poor. I could not watch it. I tried it on 3 different players, which work without any issues. But the Boss DVD plays for a few minutes and then stops, and would not continue. I would rate it a zero.
The DVD skips a little so I miss the first part of the movie!!

Love this movie. The message this movie bring is how to listen to our children and not feel they should be seen not heard and open your heart to forgiveness. A must see! Some light comedy and of course dancing but if you are a hindi fan as l am you will welcome the circle of this film.
Great movie, happy ending though with father and son.
This is a thoroughly entertaining film.  It is entirely silly, with Akshay Kumar at his best.
